All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, SocketReceiver, StreamSocketInterface
public class ClientApplet
extends javax.swing.JApplet
implements SocketReceiver, StreamSocketInterface

This is the remote client for the virtual experiments, introduced in late 2011

Version:
1.1 23.08.2012
Author:
Dominic Bosch

Method Detail

init

public void init()
Initialization of the applet, trying to set Nimbus look and feel.

Overrides:
init in class java.applet.Applet

handleCBREvent

public void handleCBREvent(java.lang.String evt)
Handles events coming from the remote experiment broadcaster and executes the appropriate command on the GUI.

Parameters:
evt - the event message that was sent by the remote experiment broadcaster

getCurrentLine

protected int getCurrentLine()
Retrieves the line that is currently read by the remote experiment.

Returns:
the index of the line that is read or has last been read

printInfo

public void printInfo(java.lang.String message)
This function packs strings of information into the protocol, so it is recognized as informatio to the client.

Parameters:
message - the message that is meant for the client

setUserID

public void setUserID(java.lang.String id)
This enables javascript from the webpage to set the user id even after the applet has loaded.

Parameters:
id - The user ID of the student as in the portal.

saveImage

protected void saveImage()
Opens the file chooser dialog that allows the user to store the scanned image.

sendCommand

protected void sendCommand(java.lang.String message)
This function packs a string into the command protocol so it is recognized as a command. It is then sent to the server through the event socket.

Parameters:
message - the command message to be sent to the server

newSocket

public void newSocket(java.net.Socket socket,
                      int port)
If one of the sockets succeeded to connect to the server it is handled here

Specified by:
newSocket in interface SocketReceiver
Parameters:
socket - The new connected socket.
port - The local port on which it has been connected.

checkConnectivity

protected void checkConnectivity()
Checks whether stream and event socket to the remote experiment broadcatser are up and running, then informs the GUI about the current state.

removeStreamSocket

public void removeStreamSocket(StreamSocket sock)
Removes the stream socket to the remote experiment broadcaster

Specified by:
removeStreamSocket in interface StreamSocketInterface
Parameters:
sock - the stream socket that is removed

removeEventSocket

public void removeEventSocket(EventSocket sock)
Removes the event socket to the remote experiment broadcaster
